title: The history of the Kings Majesties affairs in Scotland under the conduct of the most Honourable James Marques of Montrose, Earl of Kincardin, &c. and generall governour of that kingdome. In the years, 1644. 1645. & 1646.
author: Wishart, George, 1599-1671.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by Samuel Browne, English bookeseller dwelling in the Achter-om at the signe of the English Printing house,
